title.rendered: HSP Roll R Cover Series 3 Dual Cab – Mitsubishi Triton MQ 2015 – 10/2018 & Mitsubishi Triton 11/2018 +

content.rendered:
HSP Roll R Cover Series 3 Dual Cab – Mitsubishi Triton MQ 2015 – 10/2018 & Mitsubishi Triton 11/2018 + (Including Factory A Frame Sports Bar Adapter Kit)

The HSP electric Roll R Cover is the ultimate accessory to enhance your vehicle’s potential. Allowing the user to open, close and pause at the click of a button. The unit is also sports bar compatible. It also has an advanced security, high water rating and a no-drill installation.

Please note that we are currently still producing series 2 roll r cover to suit the MQ-MR Triton as well as taking backorders for series 3.
Series 2 is not compatible with cross bars, factory remote, smart led light or has a smart touchpad.

PLEASE NOTE: Depending on stock & availability, the current wait time for this product is
approx. 30 – 90 days from date of order.

– Can open, pause and retract at any point
– Sports bar compatible
– Made from heavy duty aluminium
– LED Light

Please note due to the Mitsubishi Triton tub, ladder racks and crossbars are not compatible

– Powder coat finish
– Small steel housing canister maximising your tub space.
– 100% Australian Made
– Remote Operation
– Smart App Compatible
